company_details.company_description: FinKraft AI specializes in crafting reliable automated solutions to simplify complex business processes.

products_and_services.name: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) System
products_and_services.description: Automates information extraction, data reconciliation, and real-time dashboard creation.

products_and_services.name: GST Credit on Travel Expense Tool
products_and_services.description: Automates GST credit calculations for corporate travel expenses.

products_and_services.name: Data Analytics and Visualization
products_and_services.description: Provides insights through data-driven decision-making tools.

faqs.question: What does FinKraft AI do?
faqs.answer: FinKraft AI provides automated solutions for simplifying business processes.

faqs.question: How can I contact FinKraft AI?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via email at contact@finkraft.ai or visit our website at https://finkraft.ai.

faqs.question: What are the main products of FinKraft AI?
faqs.answer: Our main products include a Robotic Process Automation system, GST credit on travel expense tool, and data analytics solutions.

careers.doing: Finkraft helps enterprises achieve invoice data extraction & validation, and GST input claim compliances at scale

about_finkraft.description: Finkraft is a leading technology company specializing in automating complex accounting processes, reducing costs, and ensuring compliance.
about_finkraft.highlights: $25m in annual savings extracted from unstructured data.
about_finkraft.mission: Automate complex accounting processes and reduce costs
about_finkraft.services: Finkraft helps enterprises achieve invoice data extraction & validation, and GST input claim compliances at scale.
about_finkraft.issue: Poor compliance with invoice handling processes are the single largest driver of tax disputes and litigation for Indian enterprises.
about_finkraft.solutions: Our cutting-edge tech solutions aid finance teams to automate compliance critical processes delivering immediate monetary saving and long-term compliance safeguards.
about_finkraft.marketReach: 15% of India’s largest corporations use Finkraft GST & Recon solutions

address.street: 122,1st Floor, Above Ayu Health 17th Main, 19th B Cross Rd, opp. HSR Club, Sector 3, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102

solutions.overview: Finkraft offers a range of solutions for various industries and processes.

benefits.maximizeSavings: Achieve up to 100% eligible Input Tax claims with our automated invoice processing and exception handling suite.
benefits.automatedCompliance: Automate financial compliances involving AP processes including reconciliations and document verification and validation.
benefits.actionableInsights: Finkraft's solutions empower finance, procurement, and sales leaders with critical insights required for identifying high-risk vendors and buyers, making timely interventions.

compliance.overview: Finkraft ensures compliance with complex financial regulations through advanced technology solutions.
benefits: Reduce tax disputes and litigation risks

resources.overview: Finkraft provides a wealth of resources to help businesses understand and leverage their solutions.

resources.offices: Finkraft has offices worldwide to support global operations.

legal.consentText: By clicking 'Accept All Cookies' you agree to the storing of necessary cookies to enhance navigation and to make our site work. We also set optional analytics cookies (including third party cookies) to help us improve the site and enhance your user experience by analysing your usage of the site.
